Turbonomic Actions

Overview

The Turbonomic Actions integration with ServiceNow solves two major use cases:

  • Create records of Turbonomic decisions, associated with Turbonomic entities (configuration items) in the CMDB. In this scenario, auditable records are generated in ServiceNow the actions that were generated or executed in Turbonomic.

  • Integrate Turbonomic decisions with the ServiceNow change workflows. In this case, change request must be approved in ServiceNow before executing corresponding Turbonomic actions.

The integration targets Turbonomic releases and can be installed in ServiceNow Paris, Quebec, and Rome environments.

NOTE:

An important use case for this integration is the implementation of custom business rules to create Change Requests (CRs) and to update action approval states. For more informationm see XREF GOES HERE!!!
